entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
